Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.service.invoker.HttpExchangeAdapter

Packages that use HttpExchangeAdapter
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.client.support
Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.client package.
org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.support
Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client package.
org.springframework.web.service.invoker
Support for creating a client proxy for an HTTP service annotated with HttpExchange methods.
org.springframework.web.service.registry
Support for creating a registry of HTTP Service client proxies, and declaring the proxies as beans.

    Description
    final class 
    NotFoundRestClientAdapterDecorator
    HttpExchangeAdapterDecorator that suppresses the HttpClientErrorException.NotFound exception raised on a 404 response and returns a ResponseEntity with the status set to HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND status, or null from NotFoundRestClientAdapterDecorator.exchangeForBody(HttpRequestValues, ParameterizedTypeReference).
    final class 
    RestClientAdapter
    HttpExchangeAdapter that enables an HttpServiceProxyFactory to use RestClient for request execution.
    final class 
    RestTemplateAdapter
    HttpExchangeAdapter that enables an HttpServiceProxyFactory to use RestTemplate for request execution.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NotFoundWebClientAdapterDecorator
    HttpExchangeAdapterDecorator that suppresses the WebClientResponseException.NotFound exception resulting from 404 responses and returns a ResponseEntity with the status set to HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND status, or an empty Mono from NotFoundWebClientAdapterDecorator.exchangeForBodyMono(HttpRequestValues, ParameterizedTypeReference).
    final class 
    WebClientAdapter
    ReactorHttpExchangeAdapter that enables an HttpServiceProxyFactory to use WebClient for request execution.
